author: 静沫人生
description: During a series of wars, common people’s lives were an abyss of suffering and hellish. Outside of the capital the fields were strewn with bodies of the starved. The people live in extremely poverty stricken state! Nowadays, The country is prosperous and the people live in piece. The common people live and work in peace and contentment. This is due entirely to two generals. One General Moli of the Northern part of the city and the other is in the Southern part of the city, General Qingyu. A man and a woman. The two brilliant generals are both well known to every household in the country of Fengchen. Moreover, both of them are equal in popularity. Indeed, not long after, during the battle against the enemy country at the frontier passage, Qingyu, the female general unexpectedly disappeared into hiding. The other general, Moli was unwilling to let his opponent disappear. As a result, he searched for Qingyu day after day.>
